tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InformedConsent (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(50),
  consent_date DATE,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
  research_study VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
	project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	project_name TEXT,
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE,
	lead_researcher TEXT,
	status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE research_participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  participant_age INT,
  consent_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE consent_forms (
  form_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id INT,
  form_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  signed_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES research_participants(participant_id)
)

CREATE TABLE research_documents (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  form_id INT,
  document_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  document_content TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (form_id) REFERENCES consent_forms(form_id)
)

CREATE TABLE InformedConsentParticipants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(50),
    consent_date DATE,
    primary_contact VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ResearchProjects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ResearchWorkers (
    worker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    worker_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ConsentDocuments (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(100),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_size INT
)

CREATE TABLE InformedConsent (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id UUID,
    researcher_id UUID,
    document TEXT,
    date_signed DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Participant (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    contact_info VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Researcher (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Study (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    researcher_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE ConsentHistory (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    informed_consent_id UUID,
    action VARCHAR(20),
    date_action DATE,
    comments TEXT
);
